"@Silent_Witness":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/541d00a56368727beba90000#post_541d00a56368727beba90000
We argued about the recent Godzilla movie.
My granddad has never been too fond of Godzilla as a concept or a character. So I took him ti the most recent one to try and change his mind. Not only did he NOT like it he will try to argue that it's as bad as the '98 Godzilla movie.
